mapper.select: SELECT t1.school_id + 1 AS missing_school_id FROM university t1 LEFT JOIN university t2 ON t1.school_id + 1 = t2.school_id WHERE t2.school_id IS NULL ORDER BY t1.school_id;
select school_name from university where province_id = #{id}

select university.school_id,school_name,city_name,town_name,header_url, tags.f985,tags.f211,tags.school_type_name,tags.school_nature_name,tags.type_name from university inner join university_tags tags on university.school_id = tags.school_id
